page.title: 13The Blacksmith RS
page.content: The blacksmith is{Stan Tweddall}whose assistants are his{two sons,}Ian and Bryan Tweddall. The{blacksmith shop}is opposite Stan's house which is in the middle of{Eppleby.}The{fire}they use for making the horse shoes is a coke fire blown by an electric motor. Stan's father moved into the old forge in 1937 and the{new forge}was built in 1973. The family has been blacksmiths for{four generations. The{work}the Tweddalls do is horse-shoeing, agricultural repairs, forge work and they make wrought iron gates. Some horse shoeing and agricultural repairs can be done on farms. The job has changed because at first they shoed cart horses but after the war they did mainly machinery repairs. Now they shoe riding horses.
